city.name: Suzhou
city.gardensDescr: Suzhou is renowned for its traditional Chinese gardens, which are outstanding examples of garden art. Notable gardens include: Humble Administrator's Garden (Yuan Yuan); Lingering Garden (Ling Yin); Master of Nets Garden (Wangshi Yuan).
city.toursDescr: Suzhou is famous for its historic canals, which can be explored by boat. Canal tours offer views of traditional houses, bridges, and ancient architecture.
city.wallDescr: Explore well-preserved sections of the ancient city wall that once surrounded the city. It’s a great place for a walk and to gain insight into Suzhou’s past.
city.marketDescr: The Pingjiang Street market offers a variety of Chinese products, souvenirs, and street food. It’s a great place to sample local delicacies and buy traditional goods.
city.workshopDescr: Learn about the silk-making process and create your own items under the guidance of a master.
city.kungfuDescr: Suzhou is known for its traditional arts, and you can see performances including kung fu and other Chinese theatrical forms.
